feed.title: Zot Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Zot: v2.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(gc): gc now removes blob uploads which have not changed within the gc delay interval by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2599
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2594
  • fix(authn): make hashing/encryption keys used to secure cookies by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2536
  • chore: update go.mod deps by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2609
  • chore: update go.mod deps by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2610
  • chore: update UI version by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2611
  • chore: fix dependencies by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2621
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2630
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2645
  • fix: work around AWS S3 limits by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2629
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2648
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2664
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2670
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2681
  • chore: upgrade trivy to v0.55.2 and update the logic of waiting for zot to start in some jobs by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2685
  • ci: stop using the non-free 4-core runners by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2695
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2684
  • fix(delete manifest): distinct behaviors for delete by tag vb delete by digest by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2626
  • fix(metrics): update storage metrics on gc by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2698
  • feat(graphql): Add LastPullTimestamp and PushTimestamp in ImageSummar… by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2699
  • fix(s3): fix check in dedupe logic by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2700
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2709
  • test: add more tests for GCing indexes referencing other indexes referencing manifests by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2716
  • chore: reduce number of spurious log messages produced by GetNextDigestWithBlobPaths by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2727
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2729
  • fix: max wait time on dynamodb by @vanhtuan0409 in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2730
  • fix: issues with nested index processing in CVE and metaDB code by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2732
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2742
  • chore: less confusing warning message when unexpected media type is found in index manifest list by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2746
  • fix: improve output of zot verify by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2745
  • fix: enable TLS based on URL scheme for sync extension by @evanebb in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2747
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2750
  • feat: add support for docker images by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2714
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2753
  • chore: update go tests to use our hosted trivy-db and trivy-java-db images by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2754
  • fix: prevent releases of helm chart with pre-releases of zot by @Andreea-Lupu in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2755
  • chore: update Trivy and Trivy dependencies by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2763
  • build: migrate to golang 1.23.x by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2701
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2770
  • chore: use go1.23 in the build environment of zot container images by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2773
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2780
  • chore: fix search for 'no digests left, finished' in nightly job by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2784
  • build(deps): bump github.com/notaryproject/notation-go from 1.1.1 to 1.2.1 by @Andreea-Lupu in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2785
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2783
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2800
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2810
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2825
  • chore: update ui version by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2827
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2837
  • ci: fix nightly runs by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2838
  • Catalog content discovery by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2782
  • ci: fix sync job after oras/ubuntu upgrade by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2839
  • ci: stacker runs best on ubuntu-22.04 by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2840
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2851
  • chore: update zui version by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2852
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2861
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2869
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2881
  • fix(headers): set Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header for UI requests by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2883
  • minor metadb fixes for dynamo and bolt by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2884
  • ci: nightly ci now uses ubuntu 24.04+ by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2886
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2889
  • ci: reenable test calling stacker by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2890

New Contributors

  • @vanhtuan0409 made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2730
  • @evanebb made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2747

Full Changelog: https://github.com/project-zot/zot/compare/v2.1.1...v2.1.2

entry.title: New release for Zot: v2.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2904
  • docs: fix ratelimit example by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2905
  • fix(dynamodb): properly handle ResourceInUseException for existing tables by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2909
  • [Feat]: Support for AWS ECR Authentication with Temporary Tokens by @tamilhce in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2907
  • feat(sync): add tag excludeRegex filter by @vooon in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2906
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2922
  • fix(sync): fixed harbor authentication issues on _catalog endpoint by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2891
  • redis driver for blob cache information and metadb by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2865
  • feat(ldap): allow to customize user filter by @vooon in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2927
  • MetaDB fixes related to Docker media types by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2934
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2945
  • More validation for DynamoDB cache driver cachetablename by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2949
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2961
  • fix: Update AWS DynamoDB permission list and correct issues in DynamoDB examples by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2963
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2978
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2988
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2991
  • feat(htpasswd): add autoreload for htpasswd by @vooon in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2933
  • Cumulative improvements for CI troubleshooting by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2996
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3002
  • [feat]: add support for EC/ED25519 public keys for token authentication by @evanebb in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2998
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3021
  • fix: show data from docker mediatypes in search results by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3019
  • fix: allow changing media-type when pushing an image tag by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3022
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3026
  • chore: update image and dist specs to v1.1.1 by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3023
  • test: add scale-out clustering tests using multiple zot servers with redis and S3 integration by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3028
  • chore: Remove VOLUME instruction from image by @polarathene in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3027
  • ci: fix failures in nightly by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3042
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3041
  • fix: bump zui version to fix minor issues with handling empty manifest lists and missing platform information by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3044
  • feat: build windows binaries by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3047
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3051
  • feat: handle multiple attributes by @zzzhouuu in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3052
  • fix(zui): show referrers pointing to image manifests by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3053
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3070
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3072
  • ci: update golang version to be synced to gh by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3073
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3084
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3099
  • feat(sync): use regclient for sync extension by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2903
  • fix: get groups claim from idtokenclaims by @lipmem in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3101
  • fix: remove unneeded double locks in redis implementation of metadb by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3055
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3112
  • chore: update conformance badge by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3114
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3127
  • feat(events): add events extension by @phoban01 in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3045
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3141
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3154
  • fix(sync): fixed checking updates in remote tags digest by @eusebiu-constantin-petu-dbk in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3156

New Contributors

  • @tamilhce made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2907
  • @vooon made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/2906
  • @polarathene made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3027
  • @zzzhouuu made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3052
  • @lipmem made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3101
  • @phoban01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3045

Full Changelog: https://github.com/project-zot/zot/compare/v2.1.2...v2.1.3

entry.title: New release for Zot: v2.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "feat(mcp): add MCP extension support with routes and configur… by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3166
  • fix: license copyright update by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3167
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3155
  • fix: parse public key as fallback for certificate for bearer authentication by @evanebb in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3180
  • Fix metrics authorization middleware bleed by @mottetm in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3183

New Contributors

  • @mottetm made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/project-zot/zot/compare/v2.1.3...v2.1.4

entry.title: New release for Zot: v2.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix dependabot alerts by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3188
  • fix: image retention policy to handle patterns even if metadb is not instantiated by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3200
  • chore: bump github.com/olekukonko/tablewriter from 0.0.5 to 1.0.7 by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3198
  • feat: add token auth support for event sink by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3197
  • chore: update zui version by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3212
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3213

Full Changelog: https://github.com/project-zot/zot/compare/v2.1.4...v2.1.5

entry.title: New release for Zot: v2.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3225
  • chore: bump zui version by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3241
  • fix: GetNextRepository to use a list already scanned repositories as input by @andaaron in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3230
  • feat: healthz server by @asgeirn in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3228
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3245
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3255
  • Fix building zot natively on FreeBSD by @dfr in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3247
  • Read OpenID credentials from file by @uwej711 in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3244
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3258
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3274
  • chore: fix dependabot alerts by @rchincha in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3275

New Contributors

  • @asgeirn made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3228
  • @uwej711 made their first contribution in https://github.com/project-zot/zot/pull/3244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/project-zot/zot/compare/v2.1.5...v2.1.6
